basics.name: Le Minh Tam
basics.label: Finance Business Partner
basics.summary: Results-driven FP&A specialist delivering actionable financial insights that guide strategic decision-making and drive business growth. Skilled in budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling, transforms complex data into clear, impactful reports. Proficient in Excel with foundational Python and VBA skills for process automation, and a strong communicator in English who effectively conveys critical information to management and leadership.

work.name: Phuong Nam General Hospital
work.summary: Developed financial models and dashboards to support strategic management and decision-making
highlights: Develop financial models to support strategic management and decision-making
Build and maintain reporting dashboards to monitor key metrics
Track financial KPIs and provide forecasts for future performance
Perform Budget Variance Analysis to identify areas for improvement
Collaborate with departments to collect financial and business data

work.name: Mirae Asset Securities
work.summary: Assisted clients with investment needs and opportunities
highlights: Assessed clients' investment needs and risk tolerance
Assisted clients in identifying investment opportunities

certificates.name: FPAC (Financial Planning & Analysis Certification)
certificates.description: Comprehensive certification covering financial planning, analysis, and strategic business partnering

projects.name: Hospital Information System (HIS) Implementation
projects.description: Assisted in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for HIS financial reporting module
highlights: Assisted in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for HIS financial reporting module

projects.name: Financial Data Structure Redesign
projects.description: Redesigned financial data structure, improving collaboration and saving 15 hours/month
highlights: Redesigned financial data structure, improving collaboration and saving 15 hours/month
